function.name: done
function.description: The task has been completed, and no further action is needed besides closing the tab if it makes sense to. The tab will close if you set your close_tab parameter to true.

summary.description: If the user just asked you to do things, summarize what you did here. If they asked you to gather information in any way, detail that info here.

close_tab.description: If true, the tab will be closed after the task is completed.
